forecast.day_comments: A chance of snow, mainly between 1am and 5am.  Mostly cloudy, with a low around 12. Calm wind.  Chance of precipitation is 40%. Total nighttime snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.
forecast.night_comments: A slight chance of snow before 7am.  Partly sunny, with a high near 21. Calm wind becoming west 5 to 7 mph in the morning. Winds could gust as high as 21 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 20%.
